1553322222222222222221222221.content:
You were laying in the middle of the forest, exhausted, aching, and confused.
"Dumb book!" You muttered to yourself as you tried to force your arms to move. You recently found an old "book of spells" in your attic and decided to give it a read, figuring it was all just fun make believe. Now you're here, lost, unableto move, and completely uncertain if you were even in the same world anymore. You heard singing echoing. The voice was feminine and incredibly cheerful. You almost wish you could yell out to get their attention. Suddenly, with a loud "thud!" A large pair of pink bare feet landed on either side of you. Looking up, you saw the source of the voice from earlier. She looked a LOT like those dolls your sister collected, only bright pink and less creepy looking. She still had the weird hair, a blue dress and a huge grin plastered to her face. You also noticed that she was much larger than said dolls. If you had to guess you'd estimate that compared to her, you were...

155332222222222222222122222221.content:
Well, today sure has been odd for you so far. It all started this morning when you almost drowned in a blob of water which turned out to be a raindrop, then it changed to almost being eaten by giant ants and now it's trying not to be seen and scooped by a lizards tongue. Needless to say, it wasn't your best morning.

Perhaps we should alliterate. From what you have gathered. You woke up smaller then a ant and Inside a giant forest/Jungle of some kind. And being at the absolute bottom of the food chain is not fun. After sneaking away from the kaiju sized lizard, you've continued walking, looking for something. Anything. That might help you. But that seems to be just a fading hope at this point and it more and more look like your going to die out here.

Your just on the verge of giving up when all of a sudden you heard a voice in the distance. "Woooooooooooo!!!!!!" it sounded like a girl and you got your hopes up. You started sprinting towards the sound thinking your making distance when in actuality you've barely made a footstep to an actual sized person. Due to this it took you about 20 minutes just to make it past a bush. And your tired beyond belief. You look around and don't see everything. If it was a normal size person, they would be long gone by now.

"Great I'm going to die this size" you say to yourself. "Small and alone"

" Well Small Maybe, but defiantly not alone!" you hear the same female voice say from above. You look up just in time to see something jump from a vine and land in front of you. You were around doll size to her as she was something you've never seen before. She had bright pointy pink hair that matched her skin. Ears that popped out at the side, a blue short dress on and possibly the biggest smile in the world.

"Hiya" she simply said to you as she gazes down at you
155332222222222222222122222221.title: Giant Poppy

1553322222222222222221222222211.content:
You watch as the giant pink creature shifted around and laid on her stomach, making her face right in front of you and let you see her contagious smile.

"Who would of thought, I was just swinging around the place like you do.... When I spotted something moving around, at first I thought it was just my imagination but when you started to talk I was like.... woah" the over happy girl creature said. "So what are you, I've never seen someone like you"

"I'm a human" you say, still not really sure if you can trust this thing, however you'd be lying if you said she was hard not to trust.

"Ho-men. Never heard of it. Did you come from a village far away somewhere?"

"No, I just kind of woke up here"

"Wait so you don't know where you are or how you got here?"

"Nope" you reply

This is when her face lighted up. "This Is So Perfect!" she cheered as she hopped up onto her feet, towering over you once again. "Not the you being lost part, but me finding you. I'll take care of you until we can find out how to send you back."

And at this point you couldn't help but smile as much as she did "Really. Thanks! I thought I was going to die out here by myself."

"No need to thank me" she said to herself. "Oh Right, you don't know my name and I don't know yours."

"It's (You Name) you reply

"Mines Poppy, roles of the tongue" she jokes. She got on one knee and lowered her pink hand down prompting you to hop on. Which you did as you climbed over her pudgy fingers. Once in her palm, she raised back up to a standing position.

"Okay, now I'm going back to my house, but I gotta keep you hidden until then just in case."

Where do you go?
1553322222222222222221222222211.title: Kind Poppy

choices: she plucks you out and hugs you
she plucks you out and plays with you
15533222222222222222212222222111.content:
“So where are you going to put me” you ask curiously. Your still a little worried about this girl, but thats quickly going away. She just seems too nice and too adorable for you to really dislike. Plus she said that she was going to take care of you, you have no idea how far she will take the ‘Taking care of you’ part but it defiantly beats being stuck out in the giant world by yourself.

Poppy thinks about this for a while before her smile lights up as she gets an idea. You expected her to tell you about her idea, not implement it before you could react. As she waved her hand and sent you flying into her tall upright pink hair. It was like a colourful dense jungle as you catch a strand of her hair to stop your momentum.

“Are you visible, Are you visible!. i can't tell” Poppy said as she jumped around.

Seeing what Poppy wanted you to do, you complied and dug yourself deep in her hair. You find your spot as you touch down on Poppy’s head, tickling her a bit and getting a giggle.

“Ok Poppy, i think I'm hidden” You tell her as she jumps in excitement.

“Ok then, I'm going be careful and make sure you don't fall out” Poppy said as she started walking back to her village. It took a while for you two to actual make it back to the Troll village. There you saw other creatures like Poppy just as colourful and just as happy. Everyone greeted Poppy and you were surprised that some of them referred to her as Princess.

Eventually you two made it to Poppy’s house. There you saw what you kind of expected. A Pink and Colourful room covered with glitter.

what does Poppy do next?
